notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

taskDescription:
Use the exponent distributive rule to expand <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mrow>
        <mo>(</mo>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mi>a</mi>
          <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
          <mi>b</mi>
        </mrow>
        <mo>)</mo>
      </mrow>
      <mn>6</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\left( {a \times b} \right)^6}</annotation></semantics></math>.
